
Vectors using <-
```{r}
x <- c(1,3,2,5)
x
```
Vectors using =
```{r}
x = c(1,6,2)
x
y = c(1,4,3)
```
length() function
```{r}
length(x)
length(y)
x+y
```
ls() function, list of all objects
rm() function, removes objects
```{r}
ls()
rm(x,y)
ls()
rm(list = ls())
```
?funcname
```{r}
?matrix
```


matrices
```{r}
x = matrix(data = c(1,2,3,4), nrow = 2, ncol = 2)
x = matrix(c(1,2,3,4), 2,2)
x = matrix(data = c(1,2,3,4),2,2, byrow = TRUE)
x
```
Exponents
```{r}
sqrt(x)
x^2
```
rnorm()
```{r}
x = rnorm(50)
y = x + rnorm(50, mean=50, sd=.1)
cor(x,y)
```
set.seed()
```{r}
set.seed(1303)
rnorm(50)
```
Statistics functions
```{r}
set.seed(3)
y = rnorm(100)
mean(y)
var(y)
sqrt(var(y))
sd(y)
```
